peril.helpers

Class PlayerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.helpers.PlayerHelper

  • public final class PlayerHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for game which encapsulates the behaviours of the list of ModelPlayers.
    Since:
    2018-03-06
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

      Contains all the Challenges that a ModelPlayer can complete in the game.

      The maximum number of ModelPlayers in the game at any given time.

      The minimum number of ModelPlayers in the game at any given time.
